summary: Hi there! This is my follower I've been working on since I don't know when (long time ago anyway!!!) that I decided to share with you people.
descriptionHtml:
Hi there! This is my follower I've been working on since I don't know when (long time ago anyway!!!) that I decided to share with you people. A really nice girl who might be a little overpowered but I like my women strong,rogue style, also you'll find her in The Sleeping Giant Inn In Riverwood. She is marriable and everything.
Now then if you want her to look like in the screen then I advise you to download these mods too:
DIMONIZED UNP female body [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?[/url]
UNP Armor Replacer Package [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34102/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34102/?[/url] OR
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP by Crosscrusade [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34160/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34160/?[/url] (both of the mod packs have her armor but the first one contains more mod authors from where you can choose armors from, including the second mod)
KS Hairdos - Renewal [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?[/url]
Pretty Face [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?[/url]

And I really recommend this one(she sounds more realistic):
Relationship Dialogue Overhaul [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?[/url]

(As a little sidenote if this is the only mod you try with Skyrim then install this really necesary (and usefull!)mods too: Racemenu [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?[/url] and SKSE (Skyrim Script Extender) which is found [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url] or here on Workshop [url=steam://openurl/http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720/Skyrim_Script_Extender_SKSE/]http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720/Skyrim_Script_Extender_SKSE/[/url]

Without these mods she wouldn't be made possible so thanks guys!

Thanks for subscribing, sorry for the troubling side instalations (but the original authors must be respected as they made some excelent work and only THEY have the right to give permission) and feel free to report anything going wrong with her.
author: tyb33rk aka Vandall RTR
